revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Verdant Cavern |image = [[File:Verdant Cavern.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Verdant Cavern. |tokens = 805,000 |location = Melemele Woods Megadungeon. }}
<!--T:2--> '''Verdant Cavern''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. The [[Gyms#Alola|Normalium-Z]] [[File:NormaliumZ.png|30px]] is awarded upon clearing this dungeon. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 11,595,673 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Alolan Rattata.png|40px]] Alolan Rattata ||rowspan=6|<center>[[File:Team_Skull_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Skull Grunt || rowspan=6|<center>[[File:Drowzee.png|40px]] Drowzee |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Alolan Diglett.png|40px]] Alolan Diglett |- | [[File:Noibat.png|40px]] Noibat |- | [[File:Yungoos.png|40px]] Yungoos |- | [[File:Pheromosa.png|40px]] '''Pheromosa*''' |}
<!--T:6--> '''*Note:''' Must be unlocked by doing [[Quests#Ultra Beast Hunt|Ultra Beast Hunt]] Quest first.
<!--T:7--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !!
